channel.title: CVE Feed for Themify -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Themify -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-24872|2024-07-05T17:21:49.389Z -- themify -- themify%20builder
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Themify Themify Builder.This issue affects Themify Builder: from n/a through 7.0.5.

item.title: CVE-2023-46148|2024-06-20T15:48:49.437Z -- themify -- themify%20ultra
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Themify Themify Ultra.This issue affects Themify Ultra: from n/a through 7.3.5.

item.title: CVE-2023-46145|2024-06-04T17:22:19.323Z -- themify -- themify%20ultra
item.description: Improper Privilege Management vulnerability in Themify Themify Ultra allows Privilege Escalation.This issue affects Themify Ultra: from n/a through 7.3.5.

item.title: CVE-2024-30440|2024-06-04T17:38:26.487Z -- themify -- themify%20event%20post
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Themify Themify Event Post allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Themify Event Post: from n/a through 1.2.7.

item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Themify Post Type Builder (PTB).This issue affects Post Type Builder (PTB): from n/a through 2.0.8.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Themify Post Type Builder (PTB) allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Post Type Builder (PTB): from n/a through 2.0.8.
